gear.name: bxh-xcede-tools-qa
gear.label: BXH-XCEDE-TOOLS: fMRI QA (v1.11.14-lsb30.x86_64)
gear.description: These tools perform QA (quality assurance) calculations and produce images, graphs, and/or XML data as output. fmriqa_phantomqa.pl and fmriqa_generate.pl produce an HTML report with various QA measures. fmriqa_phantomqa.pl was designed for fMRI images of the BIRN stability phantom, and fmriqa_generate.pl has been used for human fMRI data.
gear.author: Syam Gadde <gadde@biac.duke.edu>

birn_phantom.description: This determines if the Phantom QA algorithm (fmriqa_phantomqa.pl) should be run instead of the default Human fMRI QA algorithm (fmriqa_generate.pl). [Default=false]

fmri_dicom_input.description: Input file for bxh-xcede-tools-qa. This can be either a DICOM archive ('.dicom.zip'), or a folder of DICOM files, or an enhanced DICOM image (gzipped or not, e.g., 'IM0001.gz', 'IM0001').

invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for BXH-XCEDE-TOOLS: fMRI QA (v1.11.14-lsb30.x86_64)
